Description: Voltage Reference Setpoint Change at 275kV POC of HEYWOODBESS

HEYWOODBESS EMS controller receives the voltage setpoint from NSP/AEMO and issues a change in setpoint to the PPC. The PPC then determines a droop adjusted reactive power setpoint and determines an appropriate control value to be issued to all inverters.
Main transformer tap changer regulates the voltage at the 33kV terminals with the voltage deadband.
